name: Lee Kuan Yew
text: Legal strategist. Strengthens legitimacy and stabilizes crises.

name: Lim Chin Siong
text: Mass mobilizer. Boosts worker activism and street strength.

name: David Marshall
text: Fiery orator. Wins public support but risks instability.

name: Fong Swee Suan
text: Union organizer. Strengthens worker discipline and party cohesion.

name: Chin Peng
text: United-Front architect. Helps unite Chinese left groups.

name: Onn Jaafar
text: Moderate Malay bridge-builder. Reduces ethnic tensions.

name: Yusof Ishak
text: Symbol of unity. Boosts legitimacy and national stability.
